eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.tile

Class SteamReactorTileEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.tileentity.TileEntity
      • eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.tile.TileEntityBase
        • eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.tile.TileEntityTickableSafe
          • eiteam.esteemedinnovation.api.tile.SteamReactorTileEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.minecraft.util.ITickable, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilityProvider, net.minecraftforge.common.capabilities.ICapabilitySerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound>, net.minecraftforge.common.util.INBTSerializable<net.minecraft.nbt.NBTTagCompound>

    public class SteamReactorTileEntity
extends TileEntityTickableSafe
    Similar to the SteamTransporterTileEntity, this tile entity is used for steam "reactor" blocks. For example: Steam Whistle, Rupture Disc.

    It provides default safe update (see TileEntityTickableSafe) methods that do nothing, because it is completely possible to make a steam reactor that does not tick.

      • safeUpdate

        public void safeUpdate()
        Description copied from class: TileEntityTickableSafe
        A safe variant of ITickable.update(). It is only executed when TileEntityTickableSafe.canUpdate(IBlockState) is true.
